Package gov.fnal.ppd.chat

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JTextAreaBottom
    A simple extension to the JTextArea class which tried to have the bottom of the area visible at all times.
    MessageCarrier
    This class defines the different type of messages that will be exchanged between the Clients and the Server.
